## What You Will Need 

- JMU Student at Sophomore or Junior level
- Interest in Climate & Climate Impacts
- Interested in hands-on data work
- Some experience in Python Programming and Statistics demonstrated through relevant course work (e.g. *ISAT 251 & 252*, or similar)
- Time to commit at least 5 hours per week during the Spring 2024 Semester with opportunity to continue next Fall. 

## What You Will Get Out of This

- Learn about working with climate data
- Opportunity to develop and showcase your reseach skills 
- Pay: $15/hour
